name: bounswe2019group11
description: This is the group 11's project repository for CMPE 352 course. We are designing a traders platform for people who can be considered as a trader. Traders platform lets people follow and trade indices, stocks, ETFs, commodities, currencies, funds, bonds, and cryptocurrencies. Check our [wiki page](https://github.com/bounswe/bounswe2019group11/wiki) for more information.
